        public EnemyFormation(SpriteSheet spriteSheet,
                      Grid grid,
                      int pieceRep,
                      int initialSpeed,
                      GameStateManager gsm,
                      LevelState state)
        Constructs a puzzle object of samurai.
        Parameters:
        spriteSheet - object with sprite values
        grid - object with entity locations
        pieceRep - puzzle piece ID incrementer
        initialSpeed - speed of the falling piece
        gsm - GameStateManager
        state - current state, LevelState
